title: U.S. Space Command expands intelligence-sharing program with commercial firms
summary: U.S. Space Command announced the expansion of its Commercial Integration Cell (CIC) program, adding five new companies, including ICEYE, to enhance coordination on space threats and satellite anomalies. The CIC facilitates intelligence-sharing between military and commercial partners under non-disclosure agreements.
why_it_matters: This partnership underscores the growing integration of commercial space capabilities into military operations, enhancing space domain awareness and threat response. ICEYE's inclusion highlights its role as a key provider of radar satellite data for defense applications.
